1.title: Encrypt
1.description: Encrypt is a cryptography website that allows encrypting and decrypting texts. | It was developed as part of an Alura course with the aim of testing the knowledge acquired during the course.

2.title: Spacetravel
2.description: SpaceTravel is a website developed following the design from Frontend Mentor for a space travel site. This is one of the first sites I developed using React and Typescript.

3.title: Manage Landing page
3.description: This is a landing page developed following the design from Frontend Mentor. | It was created using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, aiming to implement the design in the best possible way. The challenges of this project are related to responsiveness and carousel animation.

4.title: Countries search
4.description: Countries search is a web application that helps the user find information about their country, such as population, language, or the current currency. | The site is developed with Next.js and TypeScript, integrating with an external API.

5.title: E-commerce product page
5.description: This is a single-page website for e-commerce products. The design is also from Frontend Mentor. | Despite being a small application, it has many features to be implemented, such as a gallery, adding or removing items from the cart, responsiveness, and calculating the final cart value.

6.title: Simple Booking
6.description: This is a page with a simple design created by Front-end Mentor. | Despite its simplicity, it presents intriguing challenges that contribute to improving CSS skills. | The project involves developing the design of a chat illustration and maintaining responsiveness solely with CSS.
